works.complaint:
Dear Sirs,

The Google-search result link from above is an website full of slanders  
against my person. In 2006, I had a litigation with an business partner  
that finally lead to a break of our business relations. In the same
period,  
I have noticed that I was the subject of an anonymous online slandering  
campaign.

Since 2006, this link results in the very first page of the Google search 

(also in the gigaalert.com).

I'm a PhD student now and I'm working with a prestigious NGO combating  
racism and antiSemitism and people still ask me about the related link  
revealed by a simple Google search with my name.

I would like to express my deep discontent about this indefinite  
slander-page appearing for so many years in the Google's - first page  
search results. Removing the link from the Google search would not  
compensate the reputation damage already made, but it would finally stop
it.

Thank you for your attention.

Kind regards,
Marius
+44 (0)798 4140 302
